overview: Acting as a software architect and process integrator Doug helps startups and established businesses appropriately apply technology to make life and work easier. For the last 25 years he has worked with businesses in verticals such as healthcare, insurance, manufacturing, gas distribution, utility locating, service procurement, higher education, research and government on a variety of projects. Skills include software engineering on the Microsoft .NET stack, database management and architecture using SQL Server, data mining using a variety of tools and techniques and much more. His focus on helping people find passion in their work and play through technology.
